channel.title: Posts on Welcome aboard!
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Welcome aboard!

item.title: Create Blog With HUGO
item.description: Before create your blog, make sure you have these steps completed: You have Git 2.8 or greater. How To Install Git on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS You have a GitHub account. GitHub You have HUGO installed. Install HUGO on Debian and Ubuntu Create Site or blog to publish. Create a new Site (Add a Theme here, chose wathever you want Hugo Themes) Follow these steps to put your website on GitHub Now it’s time to create a repository on GitHub: <USERNAME>.

item.title: I'm back!
item.description: I’m back again and I’m thinking to write some good topics here.

item.title: Deploying Java Aplications With Kubernetes
item.description: Three months ago I was learning Docker swarm now I’m learning kubernetes as orchestrator this year I’m gonna write about k8s a lot so the idea here is show how to deploy Java Aplications within Docker Containers orchestra them with Kubernetes. When you run containers you always gonna need a orchestrator in order to be more efficient, faster and continuous delivery and so on that’s the reason why I’ve chosen kubernetes and the true is basically because is the most popular I would say it’s so robust, ambicious, fault-tolerance, scaling, discovery abilities and why not use it, mainly was created at Google and now is hosted by the Cloud Native Computing Foundation(CNCF).

item.title: Missandei is here
item.description: Jan 5, 2018 by Ismael Garcia I am really excited because my lady is here, yeah my laptop baptized as “Missandei” I was looking forward to get my precious, well let me tell you her features and what OS I have installed: Memory 12 GiB Processor Intel Core i7-350M CPU @2.90GHz x 4 OS Type 64-bit CentOS 7 Graphics Intel lvybridge Mobile i GNOME

item.title: Welcome to Ismael Garcia's Blog
item.description: Hello there! I’m starting almost a new year and I decided to post some articles here in github so the idea is include content about Cloud Computing and some things about my SysAdmin life also I wanna post some articles about one of my favorite hobbies (Hiking). And another hand I wanna say thank you for all the good and bad things that come to me this year, especially starting a new year thinking different, I wanna say thank you to my Sensei Francisco Moctezuma for support me and teach me a bunch of stuff about Cloud Computing.
